Service Details: Offers various services, programs, and ministries including: '- Sunday morning gatherings- hot lunches- public computers- free local and long-distance phone calls - free clothing room - music room, art room and music studio- Little Free Library- community garden- social enterprise coffee shop (Wild Goose Coffee Bar)- Wednesday Lunch BBQs- Metro UP Financial Asset & Literacy Foundation- Metro Moving Crew- Volunteer Income Tax Clinic- Education Grant- Street Survival Packs- community initiatives- Community Shepherds- Metro Men and Metro Women
Eligibility: Call for additional details, or visit the website
Meetings: Sunday Gathering: Services from 8:30am and 10:00am with breakfast at 9.30am at the French Cultural Centre (702 Bernard Ave)
Major Intersection: St. Paul St and Coronation Ave
